title: Python Backend Developer
description: Build and maintain backend APIs using Python, FastAPI, SQL databases, and cloud services.

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Plan and execute marketing campaigns, manage social media, and analyze market trends.

title: HR Coordinator
description: Manage recruitment processes, employee relations, and HR documentation.

title: Frontend Developer (React)
description: Develop responsive UI components using React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and integrate APIs.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and deploy machine learning models including NLP, classification, and embeddings.

title: Customer Success Manager
description: Ensure customer satisfaction, manage client accounts, and provide product support.

title: AI Engineer (LLM/RAG)
description: Design and deploy LLM-based applications, build RAG pipelines, embeddings, and chat systems.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage CI/CD pipelines, Docker containers, cloud services, and infrastructure automation.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Work on frontend and backend systems using JavaScript, Python, React, and databases.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets, build dashboards, and create analytical reports for business insights.

title: Cloud Engineer (AWS)
description: Build and manage AWS cloud infrastructure including Lambda, S3, IAM, EC2, and API Gateway.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Analyze financial statements, prepare reports, and assist in budgeting and forecasting.

title: Operations Manager
description: Oversee daily business operations, optimize processes, and manage teams.

title: Content Writer
description: Create engaging content for blogs, social media, and websites, aligned with marketing strategy.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Design visuals for digital and print media, including marketing materials and branding.
